name: Berlin Science Week
content: The Berlin Science Week is a new international gathering, bringing together people from the worldâ€™s most innovative scientific institutions in Berlin. It is dedicated to the dialogue between science and society to inspire a deeper understanding of our world. The Berlin Science Week fosters interdisciplinary exchange and encourages fellow participants to connect and learn from each other. Lasting a full 10 days and packed with events on a wide-range of topics, the Berlin Science Week is open to the public and invites all those interested to check out the program on our website. This conference is hosted by the Falling Walls Foundation. For more information, please visit http://falling-walls.com.
